mapper.select: select attachNo ,uploadPath ,fileName ,fileType ,regDate ,boardNo as refNo ,eno from attach where boardNo = #{refNo}
select attachNo ,uploadPath ,fileName ,fileType ,regDate ,boardNo as refNo ,eno from attach where attachNo=#{attachNo}

SELECT 'BA' || trim(nvl(max(to_char(to_number(substr(attachNo,3))+1,'000000')),'000001')) as attachNo from attach
union
select nvl(null,'BA000001') as attachNo from dual where not exists (select attachNo from attach)
mapper.update: insert into attach (attachNo, uploadPath, fileName, fileType, boardNo, eno) values (#{attachNo}, #{uploadPath},#{fileName},#{fileType},#{refNo},#{eno})
